description: Delete clumps and/or pebbles. If neither the clumps nor pebbles keywords are given, then clumps are deleted by default.

keywords.name: clumps
keywords.description: Delete clumps (default behavior if no keyword specified)

keywords.name: pebbles
keywords.description: Delete pebbles from clumps. The clumps no longer refer to clump templates (see the clump template command). Clumps without pebbles are deleted

notes: When pebbles keyword used: clumps without pebbles are automatically deleted
When pebbles are deleted: clumps lose their template reference

examples.command: clump delete range fish inBlender not
examples.description: Delete all clumps that are identified as not being within the area of interest defined by the FISH function inBlender

examples.command: clump delete range plane origin (-671.673,780.009,620.539) normal (0.220853,-0.560137,0.798418) below
examples.description: Delete all clumps below the specified plane (from Ribbon Blender example)
Delete pebbles from clumps in 'mygroup'. Clumps without remaining pebbles will be deleted

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Use Clump.delete() method - requires iteration over clump range to delete multiple clumps
